name: Wonder Flash
summary:
Free to play, simple controls,challenging cute and kawaii 3-match puzzle!

Collection of popular fairy tale characters from all over the world!

Free 3-match puzzle featuring cute and kawaii pixel art characters with cross-stitch motifs. Welcome to the magical world of Wonder Flash!

How to play is really easy. Just collect and tap 3 pieces!

Adventure over the fairy tale world while clearing over 500 levels!

Gather a lot of cute and kawaii characters and get excited with powerful skills!

You can easily synchronize game data between devices!

Challenge yourself with a cute games that is different from other 3-match puzzle games!
info:

  • 发行: シフト
  • 平台: Android
  • 平台: iOS
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游戏引擎: Unity
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2018年5月3日
  • 售价: 免费
  • 协力: Firelight Technologies Pty. Ltd.
